category: Click Boards > Clock & Timing > Clock generator
name: mikroe.click.clockgen5
short_description: Clock Gen 5 Click is a compact add-on board that contains a digital programmable oscillator solution. This board features the LTC6903, a low-power self-contained digital frequency source providing a precision frequency from 1kHz to 68MHz set through a 3-wire SPI digital interface from Analog Devices.
